TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An inherited increase in the risk of developing a disease. Also called genetic predisposition.

Increased likelihood or chance of developing a particular disease due to the presence of one or more gene mutations and/or a family history that indicates an increased risk of the disease. Also called genetic predisposition.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Aumento heredado del riesgo de padecer de una enfermedad. También se llama predisposición genética.
